author: abstractalgorithms
message:
feat: add debug search functionality for finding post files by postId

- Implemented a script (debug-search.cjs) to recursively search for .mdx and .md files in specified directories.
- Added logic to extract postId from metadata and frontmatter to locate the correct post file.
- Included console logging for better traceability during the search process.

test: create a test script for unpublishing posts

- Added a test script (test-unpublish.js) to simulate updating a post via API.
- Defined a sample postData object with relevant fields for testing the update functionality.
